Text: REI think it is the Silver Pigeon Overunder shotgun with great carvings Give me a call Lyndon A Taylor Principal Heidrick Struggles McKinney StSuite Houston TX Office Fax Mobile Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Tuesday July PM To Subject Hey Lyndon hows it going I went looking for the your Beretta Silversmith shotgun again the other day and no one had heard of it Beretta does make a Silver Hawk doublebarrel sidebyside and also a Silver Pigeon overunder shotgun but no Silversmith Lets get together and have lunch soon I may be looking to make some career changes talk with you soon kh
